import "./upload.css"; import SideBar from "../../sidebar/SideBar"; import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Context } from "../../../context/Context"; export default function Upload() { const [book, setBook] = useState(null); const [bookCover, setBookCover] = useState(null); const [bookTitle, setBookTitle] = useState(""); const [author, setAuthor] = useState(""); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(""); const [currency, setCurrency] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(""); const [pubId, setPubId] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const { user } = useContext(Context); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newUpload = { email: user.email, bookTitle, desc, }; if (book && bookCover) { const data = new FormData(); const bookname = Date.now() + book.name; const bookCoverName = Date.now() + bookCover.name; data.append("name", bookname && bookCoverName); data.append("file", book && bookCover); newUpload.photo = bookCoverName; try { await axios.post("/upload", data); } catch (err) {} } try { const res = await axios.post("/upload", newUpload, { book, bookCover, bookTitle, author, desc, currency, price, pubId, price, email }); res.data(newUpload) } catch (err) {} }; return (
